page.title: 18BUS SERVICE/CLUBS
page.content:
have extended to the parish in 1954." Everyone has electric lights and piped main water now.
BUS SERVICE This is a list of bus times for buses passing through Bower cross roads: Mon-Fri: 0821 1026 1226 1636 1801 (Wick-Thurso) Mon-Fri 0817 1127 1327 1700 1757 (Thurso-Wick) Saturday (almost the same)
CLUBS In Bower now there are about 10 clubs which meet in the Community Centre. The sunday school meets in the new church hall. The community centre used to be a church and has recently been renovated with a new floor and curtains. It has also been given a licence. The clubs that meet are :
